main

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    GameState represents a single "run" or "save" of a game
    Author:
    Cameron Stevenson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameState.GameStateOutOfActionsListener
      Exists to react to crew members running out of actions and checks if the whole crew has run out

      • GameState

        public GameState(int daysToPlay,
                 int piecesRequired,
                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,CrewMember> crewMembers,
                 java.util.Properties properties)
        Init GameState with the necessary values to have a valid game
        Parameters:
        daysToPlay - The number of days the game should last
        piecesRequired - How many ship parts should be required to win
        crewMembers - The player's requested crew members
        properties - The game's properties file

      • haveCrewMemberConsumeItem

        public void haveCrewMemberConsumeItem(java.lang.String crewMemberName,
                                      java.lang.String itemName,
                                      int quantity)
                               throws ItemNotFoundException,
                                      InsufficientQuantityException,
                                      NotConsumableException,
                                      OutOfActionsException
        Have a crew member consume an item
        Parameters:
        crewMemberName - The name of the crew member who should consume
        itemName - The name of the item
        quantity - The quantity which should be consumed
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - if the crew's inventory does not contain the item
        InsufficientQuantityException - if the crew's inventory does not contain enough of the item
        NotConsumableException - if the item isn't consumable
        OutOfActionsException - if the crew member is out of actions

      • initCrewMemberOutOfActionsListeners

        public void initCrewMemberOutOfActionsListeners()
        Add GameState's crew update listener to each crew member

      • moveToNextDay

        public void moveToNextDay()
                   throws AlienPirateEventException,
                          OutOfDaysException
        Move on to the next day
        Throws:
        AlienPirateEventException - if alien pirates raid the ship
        OutOfDaysException - if the game ends as a result of running out of days

      • pilotShipTo

        public boolean pilotShipTo(java.lang.String planetName,
                           java.lang.String pilot1,
                           java.lang.String pilot2)
                    throws OutOfActionsException,
                           InvalidCrewRoleException,
                           ShieldHealthDepletedException
        Have the ship travel to another planet, using two crew members' actions to pilot
        Parameters:
        planetName - The planet to travel to
        pilot1 - The first pilot
        pilot2 - The second pilot
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        OutOfActionsException - if either crew member is out of actions
        InvalidCrewRoleException - if either crew member cannot pilot
        ShieldHealthDepletedException - if shield health is depleted as a result of travelling

      • purchaseItemFromCurrentSpaceOutpost

        public boolean purchaseItemFromCurrentSpaceOutpost(java.lang.String itemName,
                                                   int quantity)
        Purchase an item from the current space outpost
        Parameters:
        itemName - The item's name
        quantity - The purchase quantity
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • searchCurrentPlanet

        public InventoryItem searchCurrentPlanet(java.lang.String searchName)
                                  throws AllPartsFoundException,
                                         OutOfActionsException
        Get a crew member to search the current planet
        Parameters:
        searchName - The name of the crew member who should search this planet
        Returns:
        The item found
        Throws:
        AllPartsFoundException - if all parts are found as a result of this search
        OutOfActionsException - if the crew member is out of actions
